thread.title: Oscars 2017 stuff-up: Moonlight wins best picture, not La La Land
thread.title_full: Oscars 2017 stuff-up: Moonlight wins best picture, not La La Land

author: Broede Carmody
title: Oscars 2017 stuff-up: Moonlight wins best picture, not La La Land
text:
twitter TWEET More 
The 89th Academy Awards suffered a serious blunder on Monday, with presenter Warren Beatty reading out the incorrect winner for Best Picture. 
Batty declared La La Land the winner, when in fact Moonlight snapped up Best Picture. The actor had to awkwardly announce his mistake during the middle of La La Land's acceptance speech . SHARE Share on Twitter TWEET Link Jordan Horowitz, left, of "La La Land," mistakenly accepts the award for best picture at the Oscars on Sunday, Feb. 26, 2017, at the Dolby Theatre in Los Angeles. It was later determined that "Moonlight," won best picture. (Photo by Chris Pizzello/Invision/AP) Photo: CHRIS PIZZELLO 
The Academy Awards had to quickly retract a tweet, before publishing the correct winner. 
More to come â€” The Academy (@TheAcademy) February 27, 2017 Advertisement
